AT.name: Paper Monsters Recut
AT.description: Willkommen bei Paperland! Tauchen Sie ein in die Welt des Paper Monsters Recut und beobachten einen Wohn Welt gemacht aus Papier, Pappe, und sogar ein paar Wattebällchen entfalten direkt vor Ihren Augen. Paper Monsters Recut mischt klassische 2D-Jump'n'Run Gameplay mit wunderschönen 3D-Grafik und bringt sie zum Leben in einem brandneuen Titel für Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Klassische 2D-Jump'n'Run Gameplay mit wunderschönen 3D-Umgebungen. • Ein entzückender Besetzung von Spaß, originellen Charakteren. • Enge reaktionsschnelle Steuerung, mit Super-Geschwindigkeit und Doppelsprung! • Alte Schule Stil spielbar Oberwelt, mit vielen Ebenen und Geheimnisse auf dem Weg zu entsperren. • Tonnenweise awesome Power-Ups wie Jetpacks, U-Boote, Laser und vieles mehr! • Sammle besondere Schätze, um Bonus hohe Punktzahl Minispiele freizuschalten. • Fantastische Original-Soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad Features und Unterstützung, einschließlich Off-TV spielen! • Spaß für Gamer jeden Alters.

BG.name: Paper Monsters Recut
BG.description: Welcome to Paperland! Dive into the world of Paper Monsters Recut and watch a living world made out of paper, cardboard, and even a few cotton balls unfold right before your eyes. Paper Monsters Recut mixes classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3D graphics and brings it to life in a brand new title for Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3d environments. • An adorable cast of fun, original characters. • Tight responsive controls, with super-speed and double jump! • Old school-style playable overworld, with plenty levels and secrets to unlock along the way. • Tons of awesome power ups including jetpacks, submarines, lasers and more! • Collect special treasures to unlock bonus high score mini games. • Awesome original soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad special features and support, including Off-TV Play! • Fun for gamers of any age.

BE.name: Paper Monsters Recut
BE.description: Bienvenue à PaperLand! Plongez dans le monde de Paper Monsters recoupé et regarder un monde vivant en papier, carton, et même quelques boules de coton se déroulent devant vos yeux. Paper Monsters recoupé mélange classique gameplay 2D de plate-forme avec de magnifiques graphismes en 3D et il apporte à la vie dans un tout nouveau titre pour la Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Classique 2D platformer gameplay avec des environnements en 3D magnifiques. • Un casting adorable de jeu, des personnages originaux. • contrôles adaptés serrés, avec des super-vitesse et double saut! • à l'ancienne école surmonde jouable, avec des niveaux secrets et beaucoup de choses à débloquer le long du chemin. • Des tonnes de power-ups, y compris impressionnante Jetpacks, sous-marins, des lasers et plus encore! • Collectez les trésors spéciaux pour débloquer bonus de score élevé de mini-jeux. • Impressionnant bande originale. • Wii U™ GamePad particularités et de soutien, y compris Off-TV Play! • Fun pour les joueurs de tout âge.

Paper Monsters Recut mischt klassische 2D-Jump'n'Run Gameplay mit wunderschönen 3D-Grafik und bringt sie zum Leben in einem brandneuen Titel für Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Klassische 2D-Jump'n'Run Gameplay mit wunderschönen 3D-Umgebungen. • Ein entzückender Besetzung von Spaß, originellen Charakteren. • Enge reaktionsschnelle Steuerung, mit Super-Geschwindigkeit und Doppelsprung! • Alte Schule Stil spielbar Oberwelt, mit vielen Ebenen und Geheimnisse auf dem Weg zu entsperren. • Tonnenweise awesome Power-Ups wie Jetpacks, U-Boote, Laser und vieles mehr! • Sammle besondere Schätze, um Bonus hohe Punktzahl Minispiele freizuschalten. • Fantastische Original-Soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad Features und Unterstützung, einschließlich Off-TV spielen! • Spaß für Gamer jeden Alters.

ES.name: Paper Monsters Recut
ES.description: Bienvenido a Paperland! Sumérgete en el mundo de Paper Monsters rediseñado y ver un mundo vivo hechas de papel, cartón, e incluso un par de bolas de algodón se despliegan ante sus ojos. Papel Monsters rediseñado mezcla clásico juego de plataformas en 2D con gráficos espectaculares en 3D y lo lleva a la vida en un nuevo título para Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Juego de plataformas clásico en 2D con magníficos entornos 3D. • Un elenco adorable de diversión, personajes originales. • Tight controles sensibles, con super-velocidad y doble salto! • Antiguo supramundo jugable-estilo de la escuela, con los niveles de abundancia y secretos para desbloquear a lo largo del camino. • Toneladas de impresionantes power-ups incluyendo Jetpacks, submarinos, láser y mucho más! • Recoger tesoros especiales para desbloquear la prima de alta puntuación mini juegos. • Impresionante banda sonora original. • Wii U™ GamePad características y apoyo especiales, incluyendo Off-TV Play! • Diversión para los jugadores de cualquier edad.

IT.name: Paper Monsters Recut
IT.description: Benvenuti a PaperLand! Immergetevi nel mondo di carta Mostri rifatto e guardare un mondo vivente fatti di carta, cartone, e anche un paio di batuffoli di cotone svolgersi davanti ai vostri occhi. Paper Monsters rifatto mescola classico gioco platform 2D con splendida grafica 3D e la porta a vita in un nuovo titolo marchio per Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • platform gameplay classico 2D con splendidi ambienti 3d. • Un cast adorabile di divertimento, personaggi originali. • controlli reattivi stretti, con super-velocità e doppio salto! • Vecchia scuola stile overworld giocabile, con i livelli e segreti per sbloccare un sacco lungo il percorso. • Tonnellate di potenziamenti impressionante tra cui jetpack, sottomarini, laser e molto altro ancora! • Raccogliere tesori speciali per sbloccare bonus punteggio più alto mini-giochi. • impressionante colonna sonora originale. • Wii U™ GamePad caratteristiche e supporto speciali, tra cui Off-TV Play! • Divertimento per i giocatori di tutte le età.

NL.name: Paper Monsters Recut
NL.description: Welkom bij Paperland! Duik in de wereld van Paper Monsters Recut en kijken naar een bewoonbare wereld gemaakt van papier, karton, en zelfs een paar katoenen ballen ontvouwen voor uw ogen. Paper Monsters Recut combineert klassieke 2D-platformer gameplay met prachtige 3D-graphics en brengt het tot leven in een nieuwe titel voor de Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Classic 2D platformer gameplay met prachtige 3D-omgevingen. • Een schattige cast van leuke, originele personages. • Strakke responsieve besturing, met super-speed en dubbele sprong! • Oude school stijl speelbaar bovenwereld, met veel levels en geheimen te ontgrendelen langs de weg. • Ton van awesome power-ups zoals jetpacks, onderzeeërs, lasers en nog veel meer! • Verzamel speciale schatten te ontgrendelen bonus hoge score mini games. • Awesome originele soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad speciale functies en ondersteuning, met inbegrip van Off-TV Play! • Leuk voor gamers van alle leeftijden.

PL.name: Paper Monsters Recut
PL.description: Welcome to Paperland! Dive into the world of Paper Monsters Recut and watch a living world made out of paper, cardboard, and even a few cotton balls unfold right before your eyes. Paper Monsters Recut mixes classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3D graphics and brings it to life in a brand new title for Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3d environments. • An adorable cast of fun, original characters. • Tight responsive controls, with super-speed and double jump! • Old school-style playable overworld, with plenty levels and secrets to unlock along the way. • Tons of awesome power ups including jetpacks, submarines, lasers and more! • Collect special treasures to unlock bonus high score mini games. • Awesome original soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad special features and support, including Off-TV Play! • Fun for gamers of any age.

PT.name: Paper Monsters Recut
PT.description: Bem-vindo ao Paperland! Mergulhe no mundo de Monstros Papel Recorte e assistir a um mundo vivo feito de papel, papelão e até mesmo algumas bolas de algodão se desdobrar diante de seus olhos. Papel Monstros Recut mistura o clássico jogo de plataformas em 2D com lindos gráficos 3D e traz à vida em um novo título para Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • jogabilidade de plataforma clássico 2D com ambientes 3D deslumbrantes. • Um elenco adorável de diversão, personagens originais. • controles sensíveis apertadas, com super-velocidade e salto duplo! • estilo de escola overworld jogável Velho, com níveis de abundância e segredos para desbloquear ao longo do caminho. • Toneladas de power-ups, incluindo impressionantes jetpacks, submarinos, lasers e muito mais! • Colete tesouros especiais para desbloquear mini-jogos de bônus pontuação elevada. • trilha sonora original impressionante. • Wii U™ GamePad recursos e apoio especiais, incluindo Off-TV Play! • Diversão para os jogadores de qualquer idade.

RU.name: Paper Monsters Recut
RU.description: Добро пожаловать в Paperland! Погружение в мир Paper Monsters нарезки и смотреть живой мир сделан из бумаги, картона, и даже несколько ватные шарики разворачиваться прямо перед вашими глазами. Бумага Монстры нарезки смешивает классический 2D платформер геймплей с великолепной 3D-графикой и приносит его к жизни в новом названии для Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Классический 2D платформер геймплей с великолепной 3D-среде. • очаровательны бросок веселых, оригинальных персонажей. • Жесткие отзывчивое управление, с супер-скоростью и двойной прыжок! • Старая школа стиль воспроизводиться надземным, с большим количеством уровней и секретов, чтобы разблокировать пути. • Тонны устрашающей бесперебойного питания, включая реактивные ранцы, подводных лодок, лазеров и многое другое! • Соберите специальные сокровища, чтобы разблокировать бонус высокий балл мини-игр. • Высокий оригинальный саундтрек. • Wii U™ Gamepad особенности и поддержку, в том числе Off-ТВ Играть! • Развлечения для геймеров любого возраста.

SE.name: Paper Monsters Recut
SE.description: Welcome to Paperland! Dive into the world of Paper Monsters Recut and watch a living world made out of paper, cardboard, and even a few cotton balls unfold right before your eyes. Paper Monsters Recut mixes classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3D graphics and brings it to life in a brand new title for Wii U™. --FEATURES-- • Classic 2D platformer gameplay with gorgeous 3d environments. • An adorable cast of fun, original characters. • Tight responsive controls, with super-speed and double jump! • Old school-style playable overworld, with plenty levels and secrets to unlock along the way. • Tons of awesome power ups including jetpacks, submarines, lasers and more! • Collect special treasures to unlock bonus high score mini games. • Awesome original soundtrack. • Wii U™ GamePad special features and support, including Off-TV Play! • Fun for gamers of any age.
